hero.title: Laniak Academy
hero.subtitle: High-level basketball training
hero.description: Your journey to basketball excellence starts here. From amateur to professional, we train tomorrow's champions.

features.title: Our approach
features.subtitle: Complete and personalized training
features.description: At Laniak Academy, we believe in a holistic approach to basketball, combining technique, tactics, and physical preparation.

items.title: Individual technique
items.description: Perfect your fundamentals and develop your personal game with our expert coaches.

items.title: Team tactics
items.description: Learn to play as a team and understand modern basketball strategies.

items.title: Physical preparation
items.description: Strengthen your physical condition and prevent injuries with our specialized training programs.

items.title: Mental and leadership
items.description: Develop your winning mentality and leadership qualities on and off the court.

about.title: Who we are
about.subtitle: Discover the story, mission, and values of Laniak Academy
about.description: Laniak Academy is a high-level basketball academy dedicated to training and developing young talents.

story.paragraph1: President and founder of Laniak Basketball Academy, Modibo Niakate is a coach known for his rigor and taste for effort.
story.paragraph2: The international and captain of the Mali team, with which he finished top scorer of the African Cup of Nations in Angola, excellently combines the European and American scheme through his time at Cleveland State University, where he also finished top scorer.
story.paragraph3: His professional basketball career was crowned with success, notably with his victory in the AS week and his French Pro A championship title with Roanne in 2007.
story.paragraph4: Nicknamed 'LANIAK', he is a reference on the French basketball circuit.

mission.title: Our coaching approach
mission.paragraph1: Because each player is unique, they deserve an individualized coaching methodology tailored to their needs. Our job is to discover the player, to penetrate their universe to understand how they think, what they feel. Thus, the goal is to gather all the pieces of the puzzle that make up the player to be able to make the right decisions.
mission.paragraph2: We are in a daily laboratory and pay very close attention to small details because we are convinced that this attention makes a big difference.

values.title: Our Values
values.paragraph1: Laniak ACADEMY is a community that brings together individuals in becoming with a will to improve and be better.
values.paragraph2: We strive to combine pleasure and effort to bring out a new mentality.
values.paragraph3: Solidarity, respect, discipline, team spirit are the values that predominate and are transmitted.
values.paragraph4: Sharing values and common goals is essential as it will lead to self-challenge through others. Giving 1000% is the founding principle that leads to success.
values.paragraph5: Laniak ACADEMY aims to help progress towards self-realization.
values.paragraph6: To do this, we learn to challenge ourselves, to conquer an open and combative spirit.
values.paragraph7: Laniak ACADEMY gives you the opportunity to express your potential individually and collectively to progress.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We aim for excellence in all aspects of our training

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We use the most modern and effective training methods

items.title: Commitment
items.description: We are committed to giving our best for each player

perfectionnement.title: Advanced Training
perfectionnement.description: The 'Basketball Advanced Training Center' program offers a program focused on intensive individualized training.
perfectionnement.target: It is intended for young players and requires a minimum entry level.

openGym.description: Evening slots to provide access to gyms and the opportunity to express themselves freely (outside club scheme).
openGym.sessions: Some sessions will be driven by different game themes and improvement work.

threeOnThree.title: 3x3
threeOnThree.tournament: Training and participation in the official tournament

strength.title: Strength Training
strength.description: Different programs adapted to athletes according to the diagnosis made at the start of the session.
strength.benefits: Muscle strengthening is necessary to achieve a higher level of perfection in all disciplines.

recovery.title: Recovery
recovery.description: Sessions dedicated to muscle recovery. Different tools can be used such as stretching, whirlpool baths, etc.

individual.title: Academy Tournament
individual.description: Give visibility to the 'Academies' system in France.
individual.benefits: Organization of an annual international tournament in Cergy.

privacy.description: Your personal data will be processed in accordance with our privacy policy.

registration.question: How can I enroll my child in Laniak Academy?
registration.answer: To enroll your child, you can fill out the contact form above, call us, or visit us. We will then organize a trial session to assess your child's level and offer you the most suitable program.

ages.question: What ages are accepted?
ages.answer: We accept children from 6 years old up to young adults of 18 years. We also offer programs for amateur and professional adults.

pricing.question: What are the program fees?
pricing.answer: Fees vary according to the program and training frequency. Contact us to get a personalized quote tailored to your needs.

camps.question: Do you offer camps during holidays?
camps.answer: Yes, we organize camps during all school holidays. These camps are the ideal opportunity to discover our academy and progress quickly.

registration.question: How can I register at Laniak Academy?
registration.answer: To register, you can use our contact form, call us, or visit us. We will organize a trial session to assess your level and offer you the most suitable program.

ages.question: What ages are accepted?
ages.answer: We welcome players from 6 to 18 years old, as well as amateur and professional adults. Each program is adapted to the age and level of participants.

pricing.question: How are fees calculated?
pricing.answer: Our fees are personalized based on the chosen program, training frequency, and specific needs. Contact us to get a detailed quote.

camps.question: When do the camps take place?
camps.answer: We organize camps during all school holidays. These camps are the perfect opportunity to discover our academy and progress quickly in a stimulating environment.
